synonym.value: Nasal Eosinophils; SEOS; eosinophils, smear assessment; NAEOS

clinicianinstructions.value: Secure nasal mucus with dry cotton tipped swab and smear on clean glass slide. Prepare one slide for each nostril. Label slides with patient name and indicate left or right nostril. Air dry.DO NOT fix with alcohol or spray material.

orderelement.element-answer: Nasal SwabSputumNasal mucus on glass slide
